sentence.Network_en: This country will fortify the coastal areas.
sentence.Network_cn: 该国将加强沿海地区的防御.

sentence.Network_en: His declared agenda is to raise standards in schools, fortify parent power and decentralise control.
sentence.Network_cn: 他公布的计划旨在提高学校办学标准，加强家长权力，分散管理。

sentence.Network_en: They will be laying on liquid refreshment to fortify brides-to-be for the shopping extravaganza ahead.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们将为准新娘们准备些酒，好让她们接下来有充沛精力疯狂购物。

加烈葡萄酒（fortified wine）由马桑德拉（Massandra）酒厂藏酿，1775年份雪利酒。2001年伦敦苏富比拍卖行售出，售价4.35万美元。
强化酒(Fortified Wine)对于一般葡萄酒爱好者来说，多半还是相当陌生。而它相对高的酒精度以及比较氧化的味道，也不是初学者很容 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from French fortifier, from late Latin fortificare, from Latin fortis 'strong'

entry.def: To fortify a place means to make it stronger and more difficult to attack, often by building a wall or ditch round it.

example.ex: ...British soldiers working to fortify an airbase in Bahrain.
example.tran: 在巴林一空军基地筑防的英国士兵

entry.tran: 强化(食品或饮料);使营养价值提高
entry.def: If food or drink is fortified, another substance is added to it to make it healthier or stronger.

example.ex: It has also been fortified with vitamin C...
example.tran: 它还添加了维生素 C。

example.ex: All sherry is made from wine fortified with brandy.
example.tran: 所有的雪利酒都是在葡萄酒中加入白兰地勾兑成的。

entry.tran: 使振作;坚定…的信心;使补充体力
entry.def: If you are fortified by something such as food, drink, or an idea, it makes you feel more cheerful, determined, or energetic.

example.ex: The volunteers were fortified by their patriotic belief...
example.tran: 爱国信念更加坚定了志愿者们的信心。

example.ex: They will be laying on liquid refreshment to fortify brides-to-be for the shopping extravaganza ahead...
example.tran: 他们将为准新娘们准备些酒，好让她们接下来有充沛精力疯狂购物。

entry.def: To fortify something means to make it more powerful and more likely to succeed.

example.ex: His declared agenda is to raise standards in schools, fortify parent power and decentralise control.
example.tran: 他公布的计划旨在提高学校办学标准，加强家长权力，分散管理。

sentences.sentence: "This exercise will strengthen your upper body"
"strenghten the relations between the two countries"

means.word_mean: 2. enclose by or as if by a fortification
3. prepare oneself for a military confrontation;

sentences.sentence: "The U.S. is girding for a conflict in the Middle East"
"troops are building up on the Iraqui border"

sentences.en: He fortified himself with a sandwich.
sentences.cn: 他吃了一块三明治, 以增强体力。

jushi.chinese: 他们加强沿海地区的防御。

jushi.english: The argument fortified her resolve to prove she was right.
jushi.chinese: 那理由增强了她的决心，去证明自己是正确的。
